title: Muthada Chammak Challo Lyrics Ra One Song Lyrics (Tamil)
stanzas:
Singers: Akon, Vishal Dadlani, Hamsika Iyer
Song: Muthada Chammak Challo
Lyrics: Vairamuthu
Movie: Ra one
Music by : Vishal-Shekhar

Girl you are my chammak challo
where you go girl, i am gonna follow
what you want girl, just let me know
oooh oooh ohh you can be my chammak challo
ooh ohh

Shortly i m gonna get ya
you know i m gonna get ya
you know i even let you
let you be my chammak challo

nee ennai yetru kondaal, kannil konjam kaatu
nee mattum illai enral nesikaathu Â kaathu
pesatha vaarthai solli perinbathai kootu
vazhaasha vaazhkai vaazha vaa
wannabe my chammak challo o ohk oh(4)

muthaana chammak challo
mothathil sangathi ello
ithu ini en urimai allo oh oh oh
muthaana chammak challo

Shortly i m gonna get ya
you know i m gonna get ya
you know i even let you be my chammak challo

nee ennai yetru kondaal kannil konjam kaatu
nee mattum illai enral nesikaathu kaathu
pesatha vaarthai solli thenmathi koodu
vaalatha vaalkai vaazha vaa
wannabe my chammak challo o ohk oh(4)

Epodhum ne kan adipa, ne enna naughtyo..
Ellarum pathiruka, nikkatha partiya
Baarathil saindhirka, na enna paatiya
ullathil kaadhalodu, ottika maattiyo

nee ennai yetru kondaal kannil konjam kaatu
nee mattum illai enral nesikaathu kaathu
pesatha vaarthai solli thenmathi koodu
vaalatha vaalkai vaazha vaa
